com.scriptedmc.script.lib

Class SMCMinecraft

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.lib.SMCMinecraft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventEmitter

    public class SMCMinecraft
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventEmitter
    Key class for scripting. Allows you to listen for common/server side events. You can get it with 
    Polyglot.import("mc");
    Also contains some useful functions

      • getMods

        public ProxyObject getMods()
        Get loaded mods
        Returns:
        object with mod ids as keys (string) and mod objects as values (SMCMod)

      • isModLoaded

        public boolean isModLoaded(java.lang.String id)
        Check if certain mod loaded
        Parameters:
        id - mod id
        Returns:
        true if loaded, false if not

      • getServer

        @Nullable
public SMCServer getServer()
        Get current minecraft server. Will return null if no server exists currently
        Returns:
        server or null if no server found

      • serverExists

        public boolean serverExists()
        Check if there is server
        Returns:
        true if server found, false if not

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(int exitCode)
        Shutdown minecraft
        Parameters:
        exitCode - exit code. 0 if everything is fine

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(int exitCode,
                     boolean hardExit)
        Shutdown minecraft
        Parameters:
        exitCode - exit code. 0 if everything is fine
        hardExit - use true to exit immediately
